name: Sweet Candy - Match 3 Game
description:
We have thousands of challenging match-3 puzzle game levels filled with candies and cakes.

Switch and match Candies in this tasty puzzle adventure-free game. Travel through the sweet cookie house of candy treats. You will be addicted to these colorful candies & cookies, such as jam, jelly, chocolate, waffles, ice cream, honey, sweets, and the biscuits treasure trove of tasty match 3 town! Also, you can compete with millions of players in puzzle events or play with best friends to see who can get the highest score!

Sweet Candy Match is a stylish sweet candy-crushing match 3 puzzle-free game, available for adults or kids of all ages. Accompany the lovely bear, quickly pass through the match 3 levels, and unlimited upgrades


TASTY CANDY GAME FEATURES

The most classic match 3 gameplay and candy combinations and blastthrough blockers!
Enjoy the easy and simple match 3 levels to release your stress & relax your brain!
Plenty of fun obstacles like pink bears, yellow ducks, mysterious boxes, UFOs, coconuts, toasters, macarons, cookies, jams, lovely elephants, and milk! Collect them for great unlock rewards and become a matching master！
More smooth and crisp visual feedback than any other match 3 elimination free matching games！
It is 100% FREE and no wifi needed - OFFLINE new games. Enjoy anytime, anywhere.
Easy access to coins, boosters, unlimited lifespans, and coloring props! Crush the cookie jams！
Challenge your friends on social platforms-Facebook to get more golden stars and be the king of the leaderboard!


HOW TO PLAY:

Connect to match 3 or more candies of the same color in the new games!
Crush candies you can around the coloring obstacles to eliminating them!
Powerful matching game props to help you crush candies and obstacles quickly and efficiently!
Challenge the treasure match 3 levels to get lots of gold! Endless treasure is coming！
Pass the interesting match 3 levels and get royal full golden stars!
Matching candies: synthesize more powerful & colorful game props!


The puzzles for free adventure games keep cravings more.

An exciting & coloring candy blast adventure game is calling you! Get your time fun pass
